metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18978 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in the rack-cors (aka Rack CORS Middleware) gem before 1.0.4 for Ruby. It allows ../ directory traversal to access private resources because resource matching does not ensure that pathnames are in a canonical format. It was discovered that rack-cors did not properly handle relative file paths. An attacker could use this vulnerability to access arbitrary files.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack-cors package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.1-1').
